snippet: South Korea condemned the North Korean missile tests as a “saber-rattling provocation” and a violation of United Nations resolutions.
abstract: North Korea launches two Scud-type ballistic missiles towards the sea between Korean Peninsula and Japan as United States and South Korea begin annual joint military drills; United Nations resolutions ban the North from testing ballistic-missile technology.
lead_paragraph: South Korea condemned the North Korean missile tests as a “saber-rattling provocation” and a violation of United Nations resolutions.

headline.main: North Korea Launches 2 Missiles Into Sea to Protest U.S. War Games With South

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
